beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook: beforeEach in "{root}"

tests.title: should delete valid and existing articles
tests.fullTitle: DELETE / articles should delete valid and existing articles

tests.title: should return status code 200 and more than 4 articles
tests.fullTitle: GET/articles should return status code 200 and more than 4 articles

tests.title: should return article ID with given number of article
tests.fullTitle: GET/articles should return article ID with given number of article

tests.title: should return article ID with given parameter from URL
tests.fullTitle: GET/articles should return article ID with given parameter from URL

tests.title: should update valid article with valid title
tests.fullTitle: PATCH / articles should update valid article with valid title

tests.title: should create a new article
tests.fullTitle: POST/articles should create a new article

tests.title: should not create article with empty: title
tests.fullTitle: POST/articles invalid empty fields should not create article with empty: title

tests.title: should not create article with empty: body
tests.fullTitle: POST/articles invalid empty fields should not create article with empty: body

tests.title: should update valid article with valid data
tests.fullTitle: PUT/articles should update valid article with valid data

tests.title: should not create comment because invalid authorization
tests.fullTitle: POST / comments should not create comment because invalid authorization

tests.title: should create comment after valid authorization
tests.fullTitle: POST / comments should create comment after valid authorization

tests.title: Should update comment with valid date
tests.fullTitle: PUT / comments Should update comment with valid date

tests.title: Should not get list of plugins because of invalid authorization
tests.fullTitle: GET / plugins Should not get list of plugins because of invalid authorization

tests.title: Should get list of plugins after authorization
tests.fullTitle: GET / plugins Should get list of plugins after authorization

tests.title: should delete valid and existing user
tests.fullTitle: DELETE / users should delete valid and existing user

tests.title: should return status code 200 and more than four users
tests.fullTitle: GET/users should return status code 200 and more than four users

tests.title: should return user with given ID
tests.fullTitle: GET/users should return user with given ID

tests.title: should return list of users with given ID using parameters in URL
tests.fullTitle: GET/users should return list of users with given ID using parameters in URL

tests.title: should update valid user witch valid email
tests.fullTitle: PATCH/users should update valid user witch valid email

tests.title: should create valid and unique user
tests.fullTitle: POST/users should create valid and unique user

tests.title: should not create user with empty: email
tests.fullTitle: POST/users invalid empty fields should not create user with empty: email

tests.fullTitle: POST/users invalid empty fields should not create user with empty: firstName

tests.title: should update valid user
